name: Pro*C (precompiler) library for Oracle

screenshots.caption: A command line Oracle client for Windows based on proclib

short_description: An Oracle client library written purely in Pro*C (Oracle C precompiler for embedded SQL). Implements Pro*C ANSI dynamic SQL and provide APIs to application programs by hiding ANSI dynamic SQL directives. Designed to be portable across platforms
